original_text: And of the children of the priests: the children of Habaiah, the children of Koz, the children of Barzillai; which took a wife of the daughters of Barzillai the Gileadite, and was called after their name:
korean_text: 제사장 중에는 하바야 자손과 학고스 자손과 바르실래 자손이니 바르실래는 길르앗 사람 바르실래의 딸 중의 한 사람을 아내로 삼고 바르실래의 이름을 따른 자라

sentences.original_text: And of the children of the priests:
which took a wife of the daughters of Barzillai the Gileadite,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 길르앗 사람 바르실래의 딸 중에서 아내를 맞이했고,

sentences.original_text: and was called after their name:
